00056 {
00057     UNKNOWN         = 0,
00060     NEWCALL                 = 1000,
00064         DIALTONE        = 2000,
00068         REMOTE_OFFERING = 2500,
00075         REMOTE_ALERTING = 3000,

00087         DISCONNECTED    = 5000,
00092         OFFERING        = 6000,

00104         DESTROYED       = 8000,
